name: Bomb-Bomb
description: Quick, Short, Easy to learn game that can be played over and over again. Features Split-screen Multiplayer and a zombie Singleplayer...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.2 Ghz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 600 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires keyboard with NUMBER PAD when playing split-screen multiplayer
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.5 Ghz Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 800 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space
